desc:
- Conducted security assessments and vulnerability analyses for various clients 
 - Utilized tools such as Metasploit, Burp Suite, and Nessus 
 - Provided detailed reports and remediation recommendations

- Developed and maintained web applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js 
 - Integrated third-party APIs and services 
 - Implemented responsive designs and optimized performance

- Trained large language models (LLMs) for various natural language processing tasks 
 - Created and annotated datasets 
 - Fine-tuned models and evaluated performance

- Designed branding materials, including logos, brochures, and social media graphics 
 - Worked with Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) 
 - Collaborated with clients to deliver visually appealing designs
